transArray.content: Hanting Hotel is clean and cost-effective. The lady at the front desk is attentive. She is kind, attentive, approachable, and has good details. She is very patient. The hotel's hygiene is very good, giving people a very clean and tidy feeling.

Dear guest, thank you very much for your praise of our hotel. We will continue to work hard to live up to your praise. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel. We look forward to visiting you again. I wish you a pleasant journey.
